data.title: Best Movies Like The Hellfire Club
meta_keywords: movies similar to The Hellfire Club
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to The Hellfire Club: Fury at Smugglers' Bay (1961), Mistress of the Apes (1979), Woman from the Torrid Land (1978), The Lustful Amazons (1974), Shandra: The Jungle Girl (1999), Wild Kurdistan (1965), Tarzana, the Wild Woman (1969), The Viking Queen (1967), The Seduction of Angela (1986), The Treasure of Monte Cristo (1961)

Story: Years after fleeing his ancestral home with his mother, Jason returns home to claim his birthright, only to find his way blocked by his evil cousin Thomas.
